availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Bacon. Father of Sarah Bacon, Bettie Bacon, Buck Bacon, Margaret Bacon, Sally Bacon, and Jacory Bacon. Farmer in Mason County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, District 1, p.3. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Lower District, p. 12. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Minerva, p. 6. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 2. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #unknown, Mason County Marriages, p. 1.
